name: West Sweety
description:
It is a casual game with a relaxed atmosphere and challenge.
In the bar of west you gonna play a card & dice game to defeat them to collect their cgs and bring you happy and fun.
Five major features of the game:
1. 7 girls waitingfor you to challenge ! !
2. Fantastic 2.5D scene with space dynamic rendering technology! !
3. Full-play Live2D Animation, all by your control！！
4. Fun gameplay, enjoy the pleasure of conquering girls! !
